verses.t: And{G2532} I saw{G1492} another{G243} sign{G4592} in{G1722} heaven{G3588}, great{G3173} and{G2532} marvellous{G2298}, seven{G2033} angels{G32} having{G2192} the seven{G2033} last{G2078} plagues{G4127}; for{G3754} in{G1722} them{G846} is filled up{G5055} the wrath{G3588} of God{G3588}.

And{G2532} I saw{G1492} as it were{G5613} a sea{G2281} of glass{G5193} mingled{G3396} with fire{G4442}: and{G2532} them that{G3588} had gotten the victory{G3528} over{G1537} the beast{G3588}, and{G2532} over{G1537} his{G846} image{G3588}, and{G2532} over{G1537} his{G846} mark{G3588}, and over{G1537} the number{G3588} of his{G846} name{G3588}, stand{G2476} on{G1909} the sea{G3588} of glass{G5193}, having{G2192} the harps{G2788} of God{G3588}.

And{G2532} they sing{G103} the song{G3588} of Moses{G3475} the servant{G3588} of God{G2532}, and{G3588} the song{G3588} of the Lamb{G3004}, saying{G3173}, Great{G2532} and{G2298} marvellous{G3588} are thy{G2962} works{G4675}, Lord{G3588} God{G3588} Almighty{G1342}; just{G2532} and{G228} true{G3588} are thy{G3588} ways{G4675}, thou King{G3588} of saints{G40}.

Who{G5101} shall{G5399} not{G3361} fear{G5399} thee{G4571}, O Lord{G2962}, and{G2532} glorify{G1392} thy{G4675} name{G3588}? for{G3754} thou only{G3441} art holy{G3741}: for{G3754} all{G3956} nations{G3588} shall come{G2240} and{G2532} worship{G4352} before{G1799} thee{G4675}; for{G3754} thy{G4675} judgments{G3588} are made manifest{G5319}.
And{G2532} after{G3326} that{G5023} I looked{G1492}, and{G2532}, behold{G2400}, the temple{G3588}of the tabernacle{G3588} of the testimony{G3588} in{G1722} heaven{G3588} was opened{G455}:

And{G2532} the seven{G2033} angels{G32} came{G1831} out of{G1537} the temple{G3588}, having{G2192} the seven{G2033} plagues{G4127}, clothed in{G1746} pure{G2513} and{G2532} white{G2986} linen{G3043}, and{G2532} having their{G4012} breasts{G3588} girded{G4024} with golden{G5552} girdles{G2223}.

And{G2532} one{G1520} of{G1537} the four{G5064} beasts{G2226} gave{G1325} unto the seven{G2033} angels{G32} seven{G2033} golden{G5552} vials{G5357} full{G1073} of the wrath{G3588} of God{G3588}, who liveth{G2198} for{G1519} ever{G3588} and ever{G3588}.

And{G2532} the temple{G3588} was filled{G1072} with smoke{G2586} from{G1537} the glory{G3588} of God{G3588}, and{G2532} from{G1537} his{G846} power{G3588}; and{G2532} no man{G3762} was able{G1410} to enter{G1525} into{G1519} the temple{G3588}, till{G891} the seven{G2033} plagues{G4127} of the seven{G2033} angels{G32} were fulfilled{G5055}.
